resources.string: An error occurred while deleting the account. Try again.
An error occurred while deleting the chat. Try again.
set the start date of the event
set the stop date of the event
currently, you cannot change your data
The event will be available to everyone within a radius of 18.6 mile (30 km) from the destination.
The message will be received by everyone within a radius of 18.6 mile (30 km) from your location on the map (check your location). The status of the help will be an asset for only one hour.
Remove the contact and all correspondence with him?
the event will be deleted automatically within 24 hours after the expiry date
Please wait\nfor the download to complete.
Во время загрузки произошла ошибка. Попробуйте еще раз.

Please Log in!
 		In order to use the chat and map of the program it is necessary for you to log in.
 		By login into the program you agree to our privacy policy and terms of use of the program: Your email address, name and surname that are written in your email account, and your location will be used in the program.
Are you sure you want to delete the account and leave the program?
You do not have any friends! Add friends to your list or invite your friends to the program.
Are you sure you want to remove a friend from the list?

Thank you for choosing the program Calendar Clients. I hope what you will get pleasure from using this program. But for starting work with this program, you should execute a little and important instruction...

You need to select a calendar in the navigation bar, without this the program will not work. All events will be stored in the selected calendar of your account. And you shouldn\'t worry about the export/import of the entered data in case of purchasing a new device.
An error has occurred. Try again.
An error occurred during authorization. Try again.
The chat contact has been deleted.
If you want to be seen by other program participants, you need to give permission for geolocation.
